long_description: The heirloom black patina on this 10.25 in. Lodge Logic Cast Iron skillet eliminates the time and effort of seasoning-it's ready to use right out of the box! Lodge coats the entire surface of the skillet with a proprietary vegetable oil formula, then bakes the oil onto the utensil in a hot industrial oven. The high temperature allows the oil to penetrate deeply into the cast iron surface, creating that prized heirloom finish. Durable cast iron cookware offers superior distribution and retention of heat. Lodge Logic Cast Iron skillet features 2 pour spouts that make it easy to drain liquids.
short_description: The heirloom black patina on this 10.25 in. Lodge Logic Cast Iron skillet eliminates the time and effort of seasoning-it's ready to use right out of the box!
